page.title: 20Our Pets
page.content: {My name is Dawn.}I have two pets, a canary and a rabbit.The rabbit often escapes and we have to ambush him.We jump out on him and put him back in his cage.When mummy was hoovering the bottom of the canary cage one day the canary suddenly got sucked into the hoover tube.Only his head was sticking out but he was not hurt at all. {My name is David.}My pet is an Old English Sheepdog. Her name is Sheba. When she is eating her dinner she always gets her biscuits on the floor with her dinner and her water on the floor too.Sometimes I take Sheba out for a play. When she isn't looking I run away and she looks for me.When she finds me I stop and Sheba rolls on the ground. She likes that game. {Text contributed by the children of {King's Wood First & Middle Schools, {Totteridge, High Wycombe, Bucks.
